Description:
Room With A View Or Two!
Have you been waiting for a home in a quiet court with views of the bay and an indoor pool? Well look no further. Just listed is this amazing home that needs nothing doing except when it becomes yours you relocate yourselves and your furniture and enjoy life on the Bellarine. Be welcomed through the front door of this home and immediately your eyes are drawn straight to the views of Corio Bay, clear sight of the You Yangs and ships passing by. A lifestyle that you could get used to very quickly. Even the main bedroom with recently renovated ensuite has been angled so that when you wake up you see the view. Further living room again with views. Are you getting the message that this home has some views? Formal lounge with gas log fire for those cosy winter evenings. Completing this home are two more bedrooms, new bathroom, study and outdoor undercover living with a Stratco opening roof and all weather blinds. Central heating and split systems in most rooms have the internal climate covered.
One of the main features of this amazing home is the indoor oasis comprising pool, spa complete with bar. Bring on the party nights and days. Invite the family invite the friends but also allow yourselves the quiet enjoyment this lovely home brings.
Insights: 9 Tanderra Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Location- Golf Course Precinct!
Options galore are on offer with this fantastic block of land in Clifton Springs. With a frontage of approximately 24 metres this block provides plenty of alternatives for house construction in addition to ample space for side access to the back yard. The Clifton Springs Golf Club is a short distance away as is the water front for an evening stroll. Start building tomorrow on this generous block of land approximately 603m2.
Insights: 4 Carolina Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
VIEWS A PLENTY
In amongst this suburb of Clifton Springs are hidden gems. This block of land is one of them. In an established area of Clifton Springs you could build the home of your dreams. Just imagine having your kitchen upstairs and every morning looking out the window to a different view. Possible here in this location. Imagine having an entertainment area upstairs and enjoying the company of family and friends looking at the bay watching the ships pass by while you enjoy a coffee or a wine. Very possible here.
The sight does need some clearing before the works can begin but it will all be worth it. Fishermen will like being close to the boat ramp and golfers would enjoy being close to the golf course. Clifton Springs is a suburb still coming into its own. Why not come for a drive and explore your next living location?
Insights: 32 Yarramundi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016.

Description:
A real surprise package!
A modest facade opens to a stunning open-plan design comprising two distinct living areas both featuring floor to ceiling glass windows creating a wonderful light-filled ambiance.
Featuring solid brick walls and timber line ceilings that create a true sense of warmth and resonate character and charm.
The immaculate all electric kitchen overlooks the living area and is perfect for those who enjoy entertaining whilst preparing the evening meal.
The living space which features a Coonarra Wood fire heater opens to a small patio and generous back yard.
The three bedrooms are large and the master features en-suite and walk in robe.
A spacious separate lounge/rumpus, well-appointed bathroom and separate laundry complete the superb layout.
A double carport and separate rear garage are the finishing touches on this truly beautiful home.
Luke Campbell : 0409 554 949
Insights: 35 Leawarra Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Stylish and Spacious Coastal Living
Set amongst an establised native garden this modern well built home offers relaxed living. Views of Corio Bay and distant countryside are enjoyed from the upstairs parents retreat, boasting a large walk through robe and ensuite. Two other bedrooms each with BIR's are on the lower floor and feature sliding door access directly onto the elevated timber decking. The polished hardwood timber floors throughout the living areas and kitchen sets the modern tone of this layout. This home secures an ideal opportunity for the holiday maker to store that boat or other holiday toys such as caravan and trailer securely away in the oversized double lock up garage and second driveway off Turana Drive. This home is designed for entertaining and comes with a built in pizza oven as part of the Alfresco dining area. Other bonus features include under house water tank, solar hot water system and plenty of under house storage.
Insights: 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
UNIT 2 - It's about Space and Privacy.
Come join the neighbours who already call 15 Parkway Place home. Last of 5 quality constructed and recently built Units, you will be the first to move into this sparkling new location. Master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite complimented with 2 additional bedrooms, both with Built in Robes. Open plan kitchen and living area with quality fitout and appliances. Single garage with remote and internal access. With additional off street parking for guests and placed within established landscaped low water gardens the home already fits into the landscape. Only a short drive to schools and the Drysdale Shopping Precinct and close to public transport. Located next to parkland ensures space to walk the dog, kids to play and room to breathe! So if you're looking for an investment opportunity, to downsize or move out of home, this Unit will be perfect for you!

Description:
PERFECT AN ABSOLUTE PRIVATE HAVEN, LET THE WORLD GO BY!
"EMOHRUO" has a warm feel and will instantly appeal. Formal living with dining, bay window ...a delightful room. The kitchen is combined with meals/living and opens to large outdoor covered entertaining area, this is like a 3rd living, the orientation provides great light. 3 bedrooms all good size, all with BIR's, updated bathroom (disabled use) with second toilet plus a separate toilet. Quality window furnishings, subtle colour choice enhance No 58, gas central heating, evap. cooling and reverse cycle air conditioner, outdoor blinds and more to appreciate. Triple garage, powered workshop, garden shed, drip system and 2 lge tanks (elec. pump). This home has that special touch and has been meticulously maintained over the years ........the garden is lush and private, view the bay from the rooftop platform, inspect now.
Insights: 58 Central Rd, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Absolutely everything is new.
This fully renovated 3 bedroom BV home has been rebuilt from the ground up, specifically focusing on it being engineered for a second storey. The property has been tastefully transformed into a light filled 3 bedroom home, with polished floorboards, quality kitchen with an open plan into the dining area, ensuite and WIR to master, 2nd central bathroom, 2 spacious living areas, ample off street parking, access into the rear yard and some bay views. Absolutely everything is new, except the external brickwork, so call to book an inspection today - you will not be dissapointed.

A GREAT START, ADD OR UPDATE IN TIME.
You will not do better, invest or exceptional value for the first time buyer. Wide entrance, spacious lounge with northern orientation plus separate kitchen with generous meals area overlooking backyard. Three double bedrooms, BIR's, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Features; new window furnishings, some new flooring, split system, gas heater and pantry. The backyard has matured fruit trees which will provide the backdrop for your new garden. Side drive to carport with plenty of extra room for more vehicles including caravan/boat. Will take little to make this home even more comfortable in your own time. Close to all amenities and leisure walks.

Location, Size and Potential
Rarely an opportunity like this presents itself to secure a large property of 803m2 approx. in a truly fantastic location. Situated at the end of a well established court next to a reserve for privacy and close to the Clifton Springs boat ramp, beaches, shops, schools and public transport, this property can be the one of your dreams!
With a potential to be subdivided (STCA) or to build a dream home with two storey views over Corio Bay and You Yangs, you can't go past this great parcel of land.
Call now for more information.

Description:
NOTHING BOGAN ABOUT THIS HOME
The address name may have its connotations but they are not warranted on this beautiful home. Open and spacious with features such as raked timber ceilings. Open plan living, kitchen & meals. Good sized bedrooms and a veranda to enjoy the serenity of this location. Two room bungalow included. No problem parking the carvan, boat or trailer.
Through the garage there is space under the house large enough to sleep extra visitors if required.
Permanent residence or holiday pad this home has room to fit the family. Statistically people choose to live where they can be no more than 20 minutes from all they need to work, live and play. Clifton Springs ticks all these boxes. Schools, shopping centres, medical facilities, restaurants, cafes, wineries, sporting groups, guides, cubs, dancing, fishing, golfing, you get the picture. The Vendors really appreciate being just around the corner from the Clifton Springs Golf Club, Bowls club and close to the boat ramp.
The Dell is a historic location that in years gone by provided underground springs. Why not open this link and read about the history of this area a nice stroll from this home. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clifton_Springs,_Victoria.
Insights: 6 Bogan Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
NOT JUST A GARAGE ON THE BLOCK
Just listed at the right time is this decked out weekender. Fully lined double garage complete with split system and separate workshop. Park the caravan under the carport and you are set to have yourself a good time. There is a shower and a toilet that operate off a tank with a pump and hot water to a sink in the carport. Maybe you would like to build a home on this 585m2 and use the weekender in the meantime?
Clifton Springs offers a boat ramp, golf club, restaurants, bike and walking tracks to name a few. Plus all you need to live, work and play such as shopping and medical centres, schools and public transport.
To view is just a phone a call away.
Insights: 40 Thamballina Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
Live and play pool-side!
Breathe a sigh of relief: this freshly updated family home leaves little to do but enjoy the pleasure of pool-side entertaining, in a location that’s close to the golf course, bowls club, boat harbour and beach! In fact, with only 200m (approx.) between the home and the bay, the sound of the waves is a constant reminder of just how lucky you are! Extensively renovated throughout, this stylish home shines with big ticket updates including an eye-catching kitchen with Euro appliances and Caesarstone benchtops, gorgeous poolside entertaining area with new glass fencing and modern concrete paving, and a fire pit with hand-crafted timber seating. Highlights of the 2-storey floorplan include the stylish ground floor living/dining/kitchen that flows easily out to the garden and pool. Appliances to the high-end kitchen include a Smeg 700mm electric oven and induction cooktop. Downstairs boasts two queen size bedrooms and a family bathroom. Upstairs is dedicated to family relaxation, with the spacious master bed enjoying the privacy of a semi-secluded retreat, and the separate lounge on hand for the kids to play in. The 4th bed is perfect as a nursey, with a door through to the shared 2nd bathroom and master bed. Notable extras include updated tiling, carpet, blinds, inverter ACs throughout, solar heating to the pool, double lock-up garage with mezzanine storage plus additional off-street parking for a boat or caravan. Families will appreciate handy proximity to local schools and shopping in Curlewis and Drysdale. Put your feet up by the azure pool while the kid’s splash around & celebrate just how lucky you are to live and play pool-side!
Insights: 29 Clifton Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 26 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Location! Location! Location!
This 2 bedroom brick veneer home is just a hop, skip and a jump away from our beautiful bay and beach. Good size lounge which in-turn opens onto the patio for outdoor entertaining. Separate kitchen with gas cooking, a multitude of cupboards and extensive bench top. Both bedrooms are of a good size and have BIR's but the main is surprisingly large. The side drive into the backyard is ideal for parking the boat or caravan, and 2 garden sheds for storage one of which could easily be converted into a bungalow. All this on a block of approx. 585 m2 and only 7 that's right 7 doors from our fabulous Bay.
Insights: 26 Country Club Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Exudes Class and Quality and Ticks all the Boxes.
This unique residence sits on a double block of approx. 1200 m2's and looks out across the front landscaped gardens full of colour and life. Offering stunning panoramic views of the Bay through to Geelong and the You Yangs via a private veranda, this family home will provide the astute purchaser with 2 storeys of charm and grace. Consisting of:
* 3 generous bedrooms, Master with large WIR
* large study with built in storage
* 2 large living rooms, 1 upstairs to take in ocean views
* 2 bathrooms
* Gorgeous laundry makes doing the house work easy
* Large Cinema room with access to side fernery
* Oversized double remote garage plus
* 10 x 7 metre wide x 3.3 metre high enclosed carport for the caravan/boat or trailer
* Designer kitchen with Savoir Fare 900mm freestanding gas cooker with electric fan forced oven
* Walk in pantry, granite benches and plenty of storage
* Amazing outdoor BBQ area or adult retreat is the perfect place for entertaining
* Quality Italian light fittings, vaulted ceilings with ornate ceiling roses are just some of the features of this breathtaking property with ideal location and quality build by the homeowner who is a true tradesman invites an inspection which is an absolute must
* 3.6 kv Solar system with 14 salt resistant panels
* Easy care gardens with fruit trees and vegetable garden
* 3 x 5000 litre water tanks to water gardens & fernery
Insights: 12 - 14 Goondiwindi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Beautiful Vistas of Land and Water
Relaxing views of Corio Bay, the You Yangs and rural hinterland complement the parkland setting of this lovely family home. Situated within walking distance to the local Drysdale Primary School and township amenities this home lends itself to the growing family. Expansive views from the north facing entertaining zones and master bedroom give a relaxing aura to the home.
Space and comfort abound in the open plan living area on the upper level located adjacent to the kitchen and covered outdoor entertaining area where family gatherings are a breeze. Escape from the rigors of the working day to the spacious master bedroom with ensuite and walkin robe. A second bedroom with BIRs, study or guest room and powder room are also located on this level. Features include beautiful Tasmanian Myrtle flooring, 9ft ceilings, double glazed windows, r/c air conditioning and freshly painted exterior.
Downstairs and conveniently tucked away is a second family living area with access to its' own outside barbeque/entertaining area. There are two minor bedrooms, family bathroom, laundry and separate toilet also located on this level. An enormous undercover area with remote garage door suitable for four-six vehicles with a fully fenced rear yard is suitable for pets. Inspection a must, all reasonable offers considered.
Rhonda Humpage : 0457 313 609
Insights: 40 Leonard Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
4 Bedroom Family Home!
This spacious 4 bedroom family home is set on a 592m2 allotment and designed to cover 3 levels. The main living area being at the top of the home incorporates the kitchen, meals & family living room- a study nook is tucked away conveniently and there is access to the balcony. On level two are 3 generously sized bedrooms, family bathroom and laundry. Located downstairs is the master bedroom, ensuite and a second living area. Central heating & reverse cycle ac keep the home comfortable all year round. Double carport and single garage provide plenty of vehicle accommodation. Outdoor living, solar panels, awnings- just to name a few features of this lovely home. A home that is sure to make an impression!'
Insights: 28 Allara Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2016 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
PERFECT! THE VILLAGE CENTRE AND BAY JUST A SHORT WALK, ROOM FOR THE CARAVAN.
Glimpses of the bay....approximately five year old Dennis Family home with so much to offer the new owner, well designed allowing room to house caravan as well as boat and still room for easy to care for garden and outdoor undercover alfresco area. Spacious entrance, separate loungeroom and second open plan space including kitchen, dining and large living with doors opening to the outside entertaining area, main bedroom with WIR and ensuite, the other three all have BIR's, central bathroom and separate toilet. Features inc. central heating, fans, solar boosted gas hotwater service, dishwasher, glass splashbacks, split system, loads of storage, subtle colours throughout and more to entice. Double garage and second access for more vehicles. Well price to the market for the astute buyer.

Description:
Close To Bowls & Golf
This 3 bedroom brick home, is located in a quiet court, within easy walk of the golf club, bowls club and local park. Refurbished lounge with gas heating and views to the hills. Spacious eat-in kitchen with electric cooking, plus family room that adjoins the covered outdoor eating area. Central bathroom. Outside is a double length drive-through carport, single garage, and established native gardens. A great place to get away from it all.
